title: Learning to dive. Part 1. The Standing plain dive
brief_description: The progressive stages in learning to dive, the preliminary exercises and the way to gain proficiency. Demonstrated by a class of children aged 8-14 years. Part one: confidence exercises in shallow water; simple dives in four positions from the side of the pool; practice in the correct stance, jumping and arm movements; jumps into the water at the deep end and finally correct standing dives.
